items.content_html: The Gemini clone is an advanced, feature-rich application designed to replicate and enhance the functionalities of the original Gemini protocol, offering a secure, lightweight, and user-friendly browsing experience optimized for minimalistic and content-focused web navigation.

items.content_html: A lightweight, open-source web browser extension for adjusting volume and equalizing sound. Built with performance and efficiency in mind, it's designed to work on both high-end and low-end hardware. Contributions and pull requests welcome!
